name: Space Fighter - Star-Wings Battle
description:
Welcome to the Space Fighter, the ultimate space battle! Your mission is simple: to travel as far as possible into the depths of the galaxy, also known as the final frontier.

Features Include:
** Classic 8-bit art and music! **
** 8 Unlockable Characters **
** 2 Unlockable Worlds **
** Fun addicting gameplay **
** Autoshoot enabled **

Download and play now!
